messages.title: Stand Up for What Matters
messages.content: The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit. We have the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country – and our place in the world. The Green Party offers a different kind of politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An economy that works for all.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If you agree with us, stand with us. The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up. But it's in your hands.

issues.brexitEurope: People across Rushcliffe are concerned about the government's reckless approach to Brexit.
issues.economy: An economy that works for all.
issues.education: Young people have the best education regardless of where they live and attend university without incurring debt.
issues.environment: Committed to preserving and protecting the environment on which we all depend. We will put an end to fracking and to privatizing the NHS.
issues.health: People across Rushcliffe want to keep our NHS as a free public service, have the best care for the elderly, and need homes and jobs to keep our communities alive.
issues.labourEmployment: Fairer Living Wage, where young people have the best education regardless of where they live and attend university without incurring debt.
issues.transport: We offer a real alternative: committed to preserving and protecting the environment on which we all depend.

quotes.text: People across Rushcliffe are concerned about the government's reckless approach to Brexit, unending cuts to our public services and failure to deliver on housing and healthcare. People want to keep our NHS as a free public service, have the best care for the elderly, and need homes and jobs to keep our communities alive.

examples: People across Rushcliffe are concerned about the government's reckless approach to Brexit, unending cuts to our public services and failure to deliver on housing and healthcare.
Preserving and protecting the environment on which we all depend. Put an end to fracking and stop privatizing the NHS.

personalStories.story: People across Rushcliffe are concerned about the government's reckless approach to Brexit, unending cuts to our public services and failure to deliver on housing and healthcare. People want to keep our NHS as a free public service, have the best care for the elderly, and need homes and jobs to keep our communities alive.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Richard lives in West Bridgford where he is borough councillor for Lady Bay.
nonPolicyAttributes.employment: He also works in local government as a Transport Planner.

examples: Richard lives in West Bridgford where he is borough councillor for Lady Bay.
